name: Ken the 390
description: {{nihongo|'''Takeshi Sakuma'''|佐久間健|Sakuma Takeshi|born June 17, 1981}}, AKA '''Ken the 390''' (''Ken za Sankyūmaru''), is a [[Japanese hip hop]] and [[Contemporary R&B|R&B]] [[singing|singer]]/[[rapping|rapper]] and voice actor who is an artist of the [[Rhythm Zone]] label owned by the [[Avex Group]].
